http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4435792/what-should-you-put-into-an-architecture-specification
https://www.google.com/search?q=software+architecture+document

But at this point in the process I'm not sure that we actually have time to create an architecture document as described in the links above (additionally, I'm a bit confused by the examples I saw, since quite a few of them had portions of the documents we've already been working on creating these past two weeks...I saw pieces that looked like the project plan, like the use case model, like the design model, etc. all within the architecture examples so it's a bit difficult to draw the line)
It does look like the Software Architechture Document as shown there incorporates a lot of what we've done so far.
Perhaps the javadocs I'm assembling can be a rough draft start, and I'll continue to adapt these changes in the next week.
